pkgmetadata.longdescription: Annuity Random Interest Rates // Annuity Random Interest Rates proposes different techniques for the approximation of the present and final value of a unitary annuity-due or annuity- immediate considering interest rate as a random variable. Cruz Rambaud et al. (2017) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-54819-7_16. Cruz Rambaud et al. (2015) doi:10.23755/rm.v28i1.25.
